message:
Hello geeks,

fe moshkela fe laptop wa7d sca7be while installing linux

LCD is working but backlight is off

this a link about my problem but it didn't work for me 
if anyone faced this problem before please gimme help for a min 
thanks :)
story: Ibrahem Salah shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Bug #765438 “8086:2a42 [eMachines E527] On startup, the backligh...” : Bugs : Linux
caption: bugs.launchpad.net
description: When Ubuntu starts up, the back-light is off on my laptop. I can plug it into an external monitor and the display is fine. I can easily turn the back-light on with "sudo setpci -s 00:02.0 F4.B=[HEX]" where 00 is the brightest and FF is off. In past distributions, the GUI-based brightness utilities d…
